thread.title: Ryan says budget first, then immigration

title: Ryan says budget first, then immigration
text:
Ryan says budget first, then immigration Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 01:15 
U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan on Thursday said Republicans will move on immigration legislation backed by President Donald Trump after lawmakers finish with the current budget deal. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
